text.0:
:busts_in_silhouette: An opinion piece on @IOL claims that in #SouthAfrica “youth unemployment is at the worst levels of anywhere in the world”. 

What share of #SA’s youth is currently unemployed? How does this compare globally? 

We looked at the latest figures. https://t.co/rlYfpQOlhz
text.1: :Nigeria: During Nigeria’s recent #EndSARS protests, a graphic comparing the national budget for healthcare and education to the cost of maintaining the national assembly was widely shared on social media. But are the claims in the graphic supported by evidence? https://t.co/alXm0eXCmH
